p: Small (< 2.5 cm diameter), thin flakes that were near spalling were collected from the case-hardened cave surfaces for use in laboratory-based analyses 2017. At Leang Timpuseng the art panel is on the ceiling. Spall flakes from the edge of the ceiling art panel near its junction with the back wall of the rockshelter were collected. At Leang Lompoa and Leang Balang Pakalu 5 spall flakes from the rock art panels, including black and red pigments from motifs (SI), were collected.
